trends: There have been 39 other sightings in Erie
There were no other sightings in Erie on or around October 13th 2010
Summary: Strange cloud formation originating on Lake Erie horizon
divs: sighting detailsthe sky was perfectly clear blue. i sat on the deck on the north side of the house, two blocks from lake erie. i noticed the oddest cloud formation: a narrow column of puffy white clouds rising straight up in an otherwise perfectly clear sky. i got neighbors on both sides of my house to witness. no one thought it was a normal occurence. these are reputable people in their 40's, 50's, 60's and 70's. i called a local meteorologist *name deleted--cms\sg) with my information, and he returned my call the next day, saying he had no reports of the occurence. i described the formation to the meteoroligist as a volcanic eruption or atomic bomb (although it was a very columnar formation and obviously cloudlike). it was not steam or smoke. it was not a waterspout. the date i submitted as event date is very close to actual since one witness emailed me one or two days later with "cloaked ufos" info. he prefaced his email with "i hope you don't think this is too weird".
